data.description:
Boneless VR is an experimental Virtual Reality physics sandbox game built to test the limits of what's possible in VR. The game features unique maps, unique weapons, such as guns and swords and multiple enemies.

Guns:
Pistol (With attachments)
Revolver
Shotgun
UZI
MP5 (with attachments)
Rifle (with attachments)
Heavy Rifle (with attachments)


There are three different maps, each with a day and night variation. These include:

Arena:

![{"height":1020,"type":"image","width":2358}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982689_1708491619888963_7551767656743422023_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-1--dwINudQQ7kNvgFGNJ-_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCvps9AgE6I6rpblqWN3hx56qXm7V8mMhn-kQQnSWC9Gg&oe=66F4020F)

Court:

![{"height":1020,"type":"image","width":2358}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75394636_1021883309268074_1384158653332619720_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Y21Cfng61mgQ7kNvgEr5U-t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBKhoA8BpuL9W_ZdR3SagPXpGl9vgCKwD3hlrNep3bTqA&oe=66F3F0DA)


City:



![{"height":1020,"type":"image","width":2358}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/43997713_1092983478593677_3802443936343805700_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I2bc9GCr7oYQ7kNvgFD70MC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAAXVl6slDLieN4SWJhGvH2jLlt1rgZHaYcBeFN8BXRxw&oe=66F3FD8F)


You can engage in hand to hand or ranged combat with enemies. Or both!


![{"height":1126,"type":"image","width":2004}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75458094_4083272081896244_7245925084182113235_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Z7oOYaegtHMQ7kNvgHtwxnV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA5ybxScnADbg3GuQJFA69gmPU6cQvp7kpBe4zPRmPrlQ&oe=66F3EE5D)

The game also features two handed guns with scopes such as rifles.

![{"height":1114,"type":"image","width":1990}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75443247_3669989186547265_1101197638110488893_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9twq5kXD0n8Q7kNvgHSsg9y&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzumxBu1gfdtUIUiHsOqol3WRYeIL-3A4et7KBd_SauA&oe=66F3DABE)

There is also an external camera for video recording.

![{"height":1122,"type":"image","width":1993}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974510_457804263286239_1778581984603437815_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hP0L50LRv0EQ7kNvgGvPASi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAhm132x50ns4MgnplEPpuv5CfM0jMYqO-rlSzMu1Fxxg&oe=66F40746)
